Home.title: Enterprise authentication portal for every tenant.
Home.subtitle: Use password, OTP, or OAuth 2.0 flows backed by your existing auth service. All calls are proxied through the shared AuthClient.
Home.flowDescription: Every backend endpoint is available through our shared client.
steps: Password login > store secure httpOnly cookies
OAuth authorize → callback → token exchange → redirect

features.title: Password & OTP
features.description: Forms interact directly with the auth service for login, registration, and OTP verification.

features.title: OAuth 2.0 + PKCE
features.description: Secure authorization-code flow with automatic PKCE storage and callback handling.

features.title: Device ready
features.description: Responsive UI built with Tailwind and shadcn/ui components for every screen.

hero.title: We couldn't complete the OAuth request
hero.description: The identity provider reported an error while handling your authentication flow. Review the details below and try again.
highlights: Verify the client ID and redirect URI registration
Ensure the requested scopes are allowed for this application
Contact your tenant admin if the issue persists

card.title: Error details
card.description: Share this information with your administrator if you need assistance.

card.title: Sign in to continue
card.subtitle: Choose a provider below or enter your credentials.

card.title: Create your account
card.subtitle: Enter your details to create a tenant workspace.

hero.title: Reset your password in seconds
hero.description: Submit your email and we'll send a secure link that expires in 15 minutes.
highlights: Encrypted reset links with device fingerprinting

card.title: Send reset instructions
card.description: Enter the email associated with your account.

hero.title: Passwordless access
hero.description: Enter the 6-digit OTP we sent to your inbox or phone. Codes expire in 60 seconds.
highlights: Each OTP is unique and encrypted
Complete audit trail for security teams
hero.footer: Need another code? <link>Request a new OTP</link>

card.title: Verify code
card.description: Type the email and OTP you received.

tips.title: Security tips
items: Never share the code with anyone, including our team.
Verify the email destination before requesting another OTP.
Contact your tenant admin if you see unusual activity.

hero.title: Active session profile
hero.description: Tokens and cookies are stored securely via server actions. Review the metadata for your current session.
highlights: httpOnly tokens stored on the edge
